title: I write a research paper now what should I have to do after writing a paper? I don't know where to send my paper for review - Quora

response.answer_text: You need to choose an appropriate journal that publishes research related to your topic and send it using their submission process. I actually recommend NOT writing a paper until you know your target journal. Why? You can read more about it on this page Preparing to write a scientific paper. In summary, you need to know your target audience, the readership of the journal and the type of research they publish before you write a paper for that journal.
